title: Consider the Audience's Interest
text: Engaging the audience from the start is crucial for maintaining their attention.

title: Avoid Lengthy Introductions
text: Starting with a lengthy introduction might cause the audience to lose interest quickly and is not related to the rest of the presentation.

title: Focus on Interaction
text: Interactive elements can make the audience feel more involved and attentive, especially if it makes them think.

title: Additional Information
text: Credentials and an agenda are important, but can be included later in the presentation.
